Title: Dog Soldier
Writer: Craig Johnson (book), Hunt Baldwin (developed for television by), John Coveny (developed for television by), Tony Tost
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Bailey Chase
Plot: Cheyenne boys are disappearing, and the case may be connected to dishonest child welfare workers, a Cheyenne warrior legend, and an an ambitious Cheyenne political leader.
